pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create and Evaluate Stopping Rules // Provides functions for creating, displaying, and evaluating stopping rules for safety monitoring in clinical studies. Implements stopping rule methods described in Goldman (1987) doi:10.1016/0197-2456(87)90153-X; Geller et al. (2003, ISBN:9781135524388); Ivanova, Qaqish, and Schell (2005) doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2005.00311.x; Chen and Chaloner (2006) doi:10.1002/sim.2429; and Kulldorff et al. (2011) doi:10.1080/07474946.2011.539924.
